description:
Want to crowd fund a million dollars fast? Learn how SMART entrepreneurs raise capital FAST using crowdfunding platforms.

ABOUT THE INSTRUCTOR

Lili Balfour has advised over 100 companies, who have gone on to raise over $200 million from investors around the world. She is the author of Master the Finance Game, a Wall Street Journal Guest Mentor, a contributor at Fox Business News, a blogger for The Huffington Post, a guest contributor for HuffPost Live, and a guest lecturer at UC Berkeley.

ABOUT THE COURSE

How to Crowd Fund a Million Dollars is a concise guide to quickly launching an effective million dollar campaign. This course pulls from research conducted on successful campaigns and first hand experience.

Learn how entrepreneurs exceeded funding goals by 300% to 1,000%.
title: Finance For Entrepreneurs: How to Crowd Fund
